title: Implement Token Refresh Endpoint
description: Add a token refresh endpoint that issues a new JWT when the current one is still valid.
instructions:
Implement a /api/auth/refresh endpoint in AuthController that:
1. Accepts the current valid JWT in the Authorization header
2. Verifies the token is still valid
3. Issues a new token with a fresh expiration
4. Returns the new token in AuthResponse format

hints.text: Since this endpoint requires authentication, @AuthenticationPrincipal already gives you the validated user.
You can inject JwtService into the controller or add a refreshToken method to AuthService.
